sentences.en: a deer dazzled by the headlights
sentences.cn: 被车头灯光照得目眩的鹿

sentences.en: And, though the gleams blind and dazzle, yet do they convey a hint of beauty and serenity greater than we have known or imagined.
sentences.cn: 虽然这光芒令人眼花缭乱，但它确实给予我们一种不曾经历和无法想象的美感和静谧的启示。

sentences.en: As children, we were dazzled by my uncle’s good looks and charm.
sentences.cn: 小时候，我叔叔的英俊外表和魅力令我们倾倒。

sentences.en: Basketball fans miss Magic Johnson's razzle - dazzle in the game.
sentences.cn: 篮球迷们怀念魔术师 强纳 生球赛中的花招.

sentences.en: But strong flashes do more than just dazzle one's friends—they distort the quality of the picture.
sentences.cn: 不过强闪光不仅仅是闪得被拍的朋友眼花缭乱——强闪光也会使照片失真变形。

sentences.en: For all its dazzle --- or perhaps because of it -- molecular anthropology is not without critics.
sentences.cn: 或许正因如此,对这一切谜团, 分子人类学受到了批评.

sentences.en: I fear the light might dazzle her eyes and wake her, so I brought it here.
sentences.cn: 我害怕灯光照她的眼睛,把她照醒, 因此把它拿到这里来了.

sentences.en: I wish to dazzle - to bewilder - to inflame her senses.
sentences.cn: 我要让她感到眼花缭乱,手足无措.

sentences.en: It is the life as bright as light, but does not dazzle.
sentences.cn: 它是明亮如阳光的生命, 但却并不耀眼夺目.

sentences.en: Special just didn't have enough razzle dazzle to describe your birthday.
sentences.cn: “特殊 ” 二字无法尽述你生日的五光十色.

sentences.en: The artful Arbaces sought to dazzle the young Neapolitan by his treasures and his eloquence.
sentences.cn: 狡猾的阿耳巴克斯企图用他的珠宝和雄辨的口才来迷惑这位那不勒斯少年.

sentences.en: The crowd went crazy over the razzle - dazzle play by the rookie guard.
sentences.cn: 人们因新防卫队员的精彩表演而变得如醉如痴.

sentences.en: The dazzle of stardom and status attracts them.
sentences.cn: 明星的光彩和地位吸引着他们。

sentences.en: The dazzle of the spotlights made him ill at ease.
sentences.cn: 聚光灯的耀眼强光使他局促不安.

sentences.en: The movie's special effects fail to dazzle.
sentences.cn: 这部电影的特效未能出彩。

sentences.en: The new Star Wars movie has lots of technical razzle - dazzle.
sentences.cn: 新电影《星际大战》中有很多技术特技.

sentences.en: The spectacle of the aurora may appear to dazzle and enchant the observer's eye.
sentences.cn: 极光的壮丽景色的出现,会使观察者为之眩目和迷惑.

sentences.en: They dazzle the penetration of the composer.
sentences.cn: 他们使作家的洞察力混乱.

sentences.en: This system of industries is mounting to a splendor that shall dazzle and illumine the world.
sentences.cn: 这个工业体系日益发展,将光照人寰,举世瞩目.

words.tran_cn: 头昏眼花地；恍惚地；眼花缭乱地

trans.tran_en: if a very bright light dazzles you, it stops you from seeing properly for a short time

trans.tran_cn: 使眩目，耀；使赞叹不已；使倾倒
trans.tran_en: if a very bright light dazzles you, it stops you from seeing properly for a short time
